prompts: Create a butterfly-like Pokemon that has vibrant colors and intricate wing patterns.
I want a Pokemon with a stunning design, featuring yellow and black wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that resembles a beautiful butterfly and embodies grace and elegance.
Make a colorful Pokemon with the ability to flutter gracefully through various landscapes.
Imagine a Pokemon with intricate wing designs and vivid colors, perfect for a sunny forest.
Design a whimsical Pokemon that thrives in urban habitats and dazzles with its colorful wings.
Show me a butterfly-inspired Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to explore nature.

distinctive_features: Large wings relative to body size
